description: AWS::DeviceFarm::DevicePool creates a new Device Pool for a given DF Project

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 16384  
Update requires: No interruption

MaxDevices.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

ProjectArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 32  
Maximum Length: 1011  
Pattern: ^arn:.+  
Update requires: Replacement

Rules.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Rule.description: Represents a condition for a device pool.

Attribute.markdownDescription:
The rule's stringified attribute.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ARN | PLATFORM | FORM_FACTOR | MANUFACTURER | REMOTE_ACCESS_ENABLED | REMOTE_DEBUG_ENABLED | APPIUM_VERSION | INSTANCE_ARN | INSTANCE_LABELS | FLEET_TYPE | OS_VERSION | MODEL | AVAILABILITY  
Update requires: No interruption

Operator.description: Specifies how Device Farm compares the rule's attribute to the value.
Operator.markdownDescription:
Specifies how Device Farm compares the rule's attribute to the value.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: EQUALS | LESS_THAN | LESS_THAN_OR_EQUALS | GREATER_THAN | GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUALS | IN | NOT_IN | CONTAINS  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
The rule's value.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
